author: erikabele
msg: Fixed a typo and validation error.

author: slive
msg: Backport advice to use <LimitExcept> in place of <Limit>.

author: stas
msg: when moving test-specific config directives from __DATA__ to
httpd.conf don't use hash, or the order of arguments is not
preserved. Thanks to perl-5.8.1 for randomizing the hash seed, which
has exposed the bug by breaking the test suite.
